Hi, thanks for stopping by. Here's a bit about me:

I am an architect and product evangelist leading first-of-its-kind deliveries in London and San Francisco.

At work, I code, design and lead teams solving big hairy problems for the global 2000.

Outside of work, I ski steep & deep and compete as a triathlete.

Send a note if you want to chat.
